document.discussion_title: American Legion Auxiliary Unit 28 holds new member initiation
document.topic_text:
Classifieds The American Legion Auxiliary Unit 28 held its annual initiation of new members Aug. 7 at the American Legion Post 28, 31768 Legion Road, Millsboro. The American Legion Auxiliary Unit 28 held its annual initiation of new members Aug. 7 at the American Legion Post 28, 31768 Legion Road, Millsboro. The new members received information on the auxiliary, including the unit’s constitution and bylaws, a book on flag etiquette, a small American flag, a copy of the preamble to the Auxiliary National Constitution and their unit member’s pin. After lunch was served, the new members had the opportunity to socialize and ask questions. For information, visit alaforveterans.org or alpost28.com.
About Us
